page.title: 11A Weekend in East Calder
page.content: On Saturday morning my family got up at 9.3O in the morning,had breakfast and mum and dad got ready for work.My mum works in Woolco in Livingston Centre. My big brother Paul went to Inverness. He will come home on Monday. Colin and I went to visit my Auntie Rosie who lives in Langton Terrace. We stayed till 4.30.Then my mum and dad came for us to go for chips. After tea we played a game of cards and watched T.V. On Sunday we went to church and Sunday School.At 1.00 pm we had a lunch of bacon,sausage,egg and toast. After lunch we went to Almondell Park for a walk.At night mum and dad went to the Black Bull for a drink and a meal. We went to my babysitter. My mum and dad came back at 12.00. by Emma
